findings.title: Use of “tx.origin” as a part of authorization control (SWC-115)
findings.description: Use of tx.origin should not be used for authorization. Use msg.sender instead.

findings.title: **Owner can set fees up to 25%**
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to set fees up to 25%, which could lead to potential economic manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can set max tx limit
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to set the maximum transaction limit.

findings.title: **Owner can set max wallet limit**
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to set the maximum wallet limit.
